Reviews.Author: Stefan
Reviews.Content: Very fancy nightclub. My first time was after watching UFC 98. I believe the official after party was here if memory serves correctly. This is a large fancy place with lots of open space. Everything is upscale and nicely decorated. A very popular spot that has fallen in and out of being the  in  place to be over the years. Its definitely in the running as a popular place, maybe not as loved as PURE.  If you stay in the hotel I remember getting in free. I'm not sure if that is still the case but no matter what if you are going to be drinking at a club I would always advise to take a look at the club that happens to be at the hotel in which you are staying. If you are really particular about a club in Vegas my tip would be to stay at the hotel in which your favorite club is in.

Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: If you want to be treated like a vip, Colton is your guy! Every time I'm in town I call him and he always pulls through! I don't do Vegas without him! LAX has re vamped itself and I love going there. Next time you wanna have fun the right way, hit up my boy Colton 7025138012!!!!!

Reviews.Author: dant√©
Reviews.Content: So, as a Vegas local and employee of a major casino on the strip, it is basically my job to stay up to date on the newest restaurants, sold out shows & hottest clubs. I spontaneously went to LAX this past weekend & had the time of my life. Colten was my host & he made it the easiest thing in life. He was very efficient & quickly replied to my texts & answered all my questions. He was super friendly & I received top notch service from him, along with the manager of LAX who personally introduced himself to our group. LAX is definitely a fantastic option if you're looking for a fun night out on the town & don't follow all the hype of the edm & house craze. they have a nice mix of music, some older hip hop mixed with new pop & r&b. Honestly all of my expectations were exceeded by far & this was the funnest night i've had in a LOOOOOONG time.   Moral of the story: come to LAX, & have Colten as your host. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Author: Stuart
Reviews.Content: Kicked us out at 1am, we were still buying drinks. We stayed in the hotel but they can't promite a 70's 80's 90's 00's party... you need new promoters!! Shocking club

Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: A great place to go for a night out in Las Vegas! The place wasn't too crowded and there was plenty of dancing. The DJ played some great dancing music. Drinks were on the high side but we got free admission in so it made it worth it.

Reviews.Author: Allyson
Reviews.Content: I've been to LAX twice now and each time has been a blast. Sure, there might not be the same DJ's playing at XS or Hakkasan but honestly who cares? I go clubbing so I can dance, not jump around in an overcrowded room. If you're looking for a club that plays good music to dance to, give LAX a chance. It's an underrated night club. The crowd can vary but it's a little more mellow than the crowd you would find at other clubs. You don't have to worry about getting pushed or getting rude service from bouncers. From the hostess to the bartenders, everyone is really friendly.   TIP: Get yourself on a guest list so you can get free entrance. Also, if you have a group that has more males you can still get on a guest list with free or discounted entrance. Better than not getting into a club at all.

Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: Came here last night and loved this place. R&B so they had good music that you can dance too. Got in on a guestlist so we got free cover. Ladies got a wristband with three free drinks. Only downfall is you have to get your free drinks before midnight. One at a time and it's only well vodka. As most clubs, seating is for bottle service only. Long slim dance floor but it was packed. We got there around 11pm and it was already packed. Carrot Top was supposed to DJ here this night, he literally came on for two songs and left. So that's not cool with all the advertisement they had going on for him. Cool place. We'll be back. They wand you before you go in.

Reviews.Author: Gabriella
Reviews.Content: Great start off spot for the night! Great music, lots of dancing, hot bartenders (both girls and guys) and the dancers whose job is to hype up the crowd excel! We even went fairly early... On a Thursday Around 10:30ish and it was still packed! Nice!

Reviews.Author: Haley
Reviews.Content: I went to this nightclub as part of a package offered by my hostel that included transportation and VIP entry. I was very impressed with the easy entry into the club. The music was great and kept us dancing all night long. There was a special guest performer at some point in the night, but I can't remember who he was. The dance floor was honestly quite small and very packed. I do prefer dancing on a very full dance club, but it was sooo dimly lit and easy to lose people in the crowd. Otherwise it was a fun experience! Unfortunately I'm not sure about drink prices, but I always recommend drinking before you go out anyway!

Reviews.Author: Mani
Reviews.Content: We made it to this club and everyone in our group was over 21. My friend's license was expired but the bouncers at the door must have looked past it or didn't care and let us in. He had a valid paper ID just in case they weren't OK with the expired license however, b/c they didn't say anything we didn't bother.  15 minutes into the club, some bouncer literally singled us out and asked my friend to step out. He looked at his ID and kicked him out. My friend was telling him that he had another ID but the bouncer didn't bother to care and just pushed him out.   Literally took our cover charge just to kick us out.  So many clubs in Vegas, don't waste your time with the rude staff here.

Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: We didn't order any drinks in here so I can't confirm on the lack of alochol content but it isn't as crowded as most clubs located on the strip. The music is good, but if you're looking for big DJ's better to to head over to Hakkasan.

Reviews.Author: Myrna
Reviews.Content: The entire staff was professional and made me feel extremely safe to enjoy the night. Manager Bob Dziak has a wonderful team: Jose and Eric with entrance and accommodations, and Robert inside monitoring and keeping patrons safe. I am definitely coming back and telling my friends to check it out.

Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: So Id never been here before.  The club itself is ok. Nothing really special.   But we showed up Thursday 3/10/16 because they do a  throwback Thursday and Too $hort was gonna perform.  The music was good all stuff from late 80's thru 90's  Too $hort was awesome like always (3rd time seeing him perform)

Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I had a great time here over the weekend. Colten is a great person to get in touch with for all your bottle service needs. He made the magic happen and we came into town last min. I can't say enough for the staff. They made the bottle service experience great!! I even liked the go go dancers. They were fun and full of energy. The club had a good mix of music . It had something for everybody. I would come here again. Thanks Colten !!   :)

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: LAX isn't necessarily here to compete with the big new, flashy nightclubs of Vegas and has been around for a bit.  That isn't to say it's completely off but make sure that you're coming to the area for the right expectations and crowds.    I was at LAX for an after-party mixed with a seemingly regular club night.  It's a fairly big club, starting with a big climb up the stairs.  There's a weird dungeon hole (exclusive VIP area when I was there) as you walk over to the main dance floor and a ton of tables.  The dance floor oddly is segmented off a little bit to the side which makes for a lot of room to see the dance floor/DJ above the stairs but the dance floor itself seemed a little small.  Drinks seemed a little cheaper than other, bigger clubs while the crowd was a mix of the younger after-party segment as well as some of the older clientele.  The music the night I went was a mix of techno/light electric hits.    All-around, there's nothing really off per say that I would say one should absolutely avoid the club...but there isn't anything to say that would necessarily persuade me to stop on by other than perhaps a DJ name or being at the hotel itself (which for guys is usually a reduced rate - girls for free).

Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: So we went here for a bachelorette weekend and it was great we got on a guest list so no cover but the DJ for Saturday was great he played late 90's early 2000's to recent songs which is great because the age group in the club was mixed (not bad mixed like a bunch of old ppl but good). The venue is pretty big it wasnt too crowded which is great so people arent falling all over you or spilling drinks on you. Overall great experience.

Reviews.Author: Viviana
Reviews.Content: My first time in Vegas and we decided to go to LAX because it was located inside our hotel. Great choice we made! They had good music playing all night long. Not one bad song. Even the crowd was great and overall super fun! And to make it better the entrance was free because we got on the guest list so make sure you get on that guest list to avoid the fees!   Good music, good crowd & good bartenders! What more could you ask for.

Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Everyone from the bouncers to the bartenders were friendly, helpful, and courteous. The DJ was great, lights were awesome, nice male/female ratio, not overly crowded, and it was easy to get to the bars for more drinks. Can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Went with co workers and friends to enjoy New Year's Eve! We spent New Years in Lax, and it was amazing. I know there's a awful lot of places to go in Vegas but we ended up having a great time and the staff truly took care of us. Because of this we also spent the rest of the weekend there ! Great staff, awesome new renovations. Thank you LAX, and Colton, for taking such great care of us and making our trip one we will never forget!!  Mark

Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: Had a great time at LAX. Colten set us up with bottle service and everything was on point. He's our go-to guy from now on in Vegas

Reviews.Author: Ira
Reviews.Content: Staff is great, the lay out is nice and lots of room to dance. The DJ's and or the music is just very inconsistent. Either play all hip hop or all EDM in the same night. Mixing it up kind of feels all over the place and it does not draw a specific crowd. Would be good to have a hip hop night one of the days it's open. The strip has gone to mostly EDM and lacks choices for the hip hop or R&B crowd. Granted it is not a crowd many clubs wish to deal wish but it would be nice to have a music selection like One Oak maybe one night a week.

Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Music was great. They didn't honor the free drinks and 45 for three drinks isn't bad, but there is a lack of alcohol.

Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: Intimacy is what I was looking for. Great atmosphere  great music and Rickey was beyond helpful in recommending LAX over our experts experience at Hakkasan. Don't know why I went anywhere else!

Reviews.Author: Marissa
Reviews.Content: I never had a bad time here  But at the same time it's so ghetto I think the music is ok But the reason we stopped going here was  We had a $150 bill of drinks. My girlfriend asked for a ice water, and the bartender said they can't give it.  They sell Fiji water for $8  He wasn't budging And she had to drive It was because of a simple request of water  That we paid the bartender $150.00 and gave him literally an $8.00 tip  We left and I told all my friends that are locals  about it - but then again this club is a very old nightclub.  There's a million better places to go in vegas.  Bye Felecia

Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This club is tired. Nothing wrong with the drinks or service, but even on a Friday night it was fairly dead.  Good option if you are looking for something less crazy, but a bit depressing because it definitely seemed to be  out.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I havnt been to LAX in yearrrss. I had friends in town so we decided to go since they were staying at the Luxor. We had such a blast! We got a couple bottles of champagne to celebrate my friends bday. The staff brought out a big happy birthday presentation with a ton of confetti! Our waitress Sarah was awesome!! She was so friendly and told us about some good shows and restaurants to check out. Anytime our glass was close to empty she was on top of it filling it up! Such great service I can't wait to go back!! Thank you!

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Came here for a night out with my boyfriend and was on a VIP guest list , I was handed a complimentary drink ticket, mind you we arrived at about 11:30 and never told that the ticket expires by anyone at all. About 12:10 I head over to the bar and go to give the bald headed bar tender my ticket and he says quite rudely no that expired at 12, I explained that I was never told that and he said sorry and was super rude. Then I still ask for a drink and he ignores me and walks away and then comes back and is just staring at me. I said can I still get my drink and he just goes to make it for me. We were charged $47 for 2 shots of ciroc and a Vegas bomb, super overpriced. Music was okay but I don't appreciate the rude bartender, super unnecessary.

Reviews.Author: Vannessa
Reviews.Content: Wasn't expecting much, and not much ended up happening. From the beginning, there was no line for their NYE event that stated  will call  so I was being tossed amongst confused employees. After entering, I showed a screenshot of my confirmation number to the girl at check-in/coat check. She said that she had to see my screenshot say  2 tickets  in order to let me in. The confirmation number meant nothing! Then I showed her another screenshot of  GA seat x  and  GA seat y  (see photos). I mean clearly that means 2 different tickets. She still said  It needs to say 2 tickets  so after stepping to the side and trying to bring up my itinerary with M-Life, I managed to get this particular screen to display. The sass and attitude flipped and she tried to say,  ooh, open bar til 11!  lol. Terrible. Guess what? After contacting LAX's facebook page via a message, they had said there was no open bar. There was no advertisement of it on their promo photos, but it turns out that they actually did have open bar from 9-11. Clearly there are idiots working for LAX, but as I said from the get go: I didn't expect much. There's a reason for all their awful reviews. Stay far away. :)

Reviews.Author: Rayshawn
Reviews.Content: My visit to LAX was the most fun I've had at a night club in a long time.  In comparison to others I've been to on the strip such as Tao and Hakkasan, LAX is smaller but plays a much better selection of music. The dance floor isn't as big but is a decent size with bars placed on each side for easy access. This was the weekend of the McGregor Vs. Diaz fight in Vegas so Donald  Cowboy  Cerrone made an appearance in the club to celebrate his victory which got the crowd pretty pumped. To add, there wasn't a single dancer in there that night that wasn't an eye catcher.  For the drinks, they're pretty expensive so make sure to bring lots of cash or drink up before heading inside so you don't have to spend as much. The drinks are mixed strong so that's a plus I guess.  I normally wouldn't boast on a night at a night club but this was a blast. The group of friends I went with are awesome as always so that made this experience ten times more fun. I can honestly say I look forward to stepping into LAX again.  LAX Nightclub 8/20/2016

Reviews.Author: Mrtadow
Reviews.Content: Good music, drinks are pricey REALLY PRICEY, lol. You can feel the bass in your feet the DJ was bomb!

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Wow! A+ experience. Throwback Thursday's are a great slice of nostalgia. Tonight featured Juvenile and the entire evening was awesome! Thanks Brandon for making it look like I knew what I was doing, lol. Jennifer and Skye took such great care of us with bottle service, definitely a solid choice.

Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: Came here last night for throw back Thursday with 3 of my girlfriends, and had a blast.  The club was recently renovated, and the dance floor was apparently enlarged, which gave people just enough breathing room (a big plus) while busting a move. The DJ was awesome, playing some of my (and everyone else's) favorites (DMX, Backstreet Boys, Missy, Nelly, Flo Rida).  The crowd was a mix of 20 somethings and mature 40 year olds, but everyone was on the floor rocking it out.  A word of advice, get on the VIP list if you can, we did and it was super helpful.  We skipped the general admissions line, and got a bracelet with 3 free drink vouchers (bonus!!).  Overall, LAX was a good time.

Reviews.Author: Eri
Reviews.Content: Chill club went on a Saturday night but it wasn't that packed. The music they were playing was good though, as they were playing a lot of hip hop.   I've been here before and had bottle service but I didn't this time as we just wanted to walk around.

Reviews.Author: Kiorri
Reviews.Content: The promoters were awesome! The music was great and my group literally danced our ass off. Best club choice.

Reviews.Author: Isabel
Reviews.Content: Had a great night thanks to Rickey!!!!!! So going back next new years. Great place really great music I so recommend this place to everyone. Thank you Rickey for a great new years !!!!

Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: LAX Nightclub proved to be an awesome Vegas experience for me and my friends.  We were very well taken care of by our vip host Dago, and I can't thank him enough.  DJ Scooter was amazing, kept us dancing all night.  The service was great and our glasses were always full.  The club is really looking good now with the remodels.  They really put on a great party and I can't wait to go back.  Thanks Dago and the LAX Nightclub staff!

Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Thanks Brandon. We had a blast and the rest of the staff was awesome. Can't wait to come back.

Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: I just moved to Vegas in November from Los Angeles and I've been to LAX twice so far and it hasn't disappointed me yet. If you're into new and old hip hop LAX is definitely the place to go. I love to dance and I've literally danced til the club closes both times and mind you they don't close til 4am.(LA clubs should start closing at 4am lol)  The drinks were priced between $10-18 but that's what you can expect at any club.   Music: Music is mostly new and old hip hop with some top 40(I went on a Saturday I believe the music is different every night it's open)  Dancing: Dance floor has enough space to dance although after 12-1am it can get crowed on the dance floor and you'll be bumping shoulders although I have the broadest shoulders of anyone so that's probably my fault lol  Women: The ladies are very beautiful at least the two times I've went there and the ladies I did meet seemed really cool and we'er open to dancing although you'll get the few who rather sit or dance with their bff's lol  Entry: Entry was $30 for guys both times I went. I have to find out if they do anything for locals on the entry though.   Overall my favorite club so far on the strip and I've been to a few clubs so far since I've been living in Vegas!

Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: Thanks Dagon for hook up on the guest list...Throwback Thursday is awesome, music was on point from way back in the days. We will definitely return on our next visit.

Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I haven't been here in years, love the new changes. Music is open format so there is something for everyone. The staff is very friendly, way different from other clubs on the strip. The Asian bartender was amazing. Definitely going back soon. Would highly recommend this place.

Reviews.Author: Yelp
Reviews.Content: love LAX! always have; always will. always had a great time here as a tourist & even more as a local. cool music. interesting, fun crowd.  -bar service used to be terrible...was frustratingly slow & rude pre-renovation. i hope they've upgraded the bar staff.   -i hope the music isnt so overly hip-hoppy still. i like hip-hop & i do love LAX...BUT the tip left by a previous yelper about 'this club trying to be ratchet' (unfort) rings true.   -can't you ppl @lax PLS PLS 'class-up' the music just a bit?!  nina sky was a good start...now how about throwing in some zedd, krewella, icona pop, & other danceable-fun music so that the classier females in the club dont have to worry about having to bust out a stanky leg or some other ridiculously-trashy move ??  i'd really love to see the newly-renovated LAX succeed. i fear your crowds will begin to look more like the crowds @crown nightclub (@rio) if you dont do away with some of the overly-trashy music that lax became infamous for in the past.

Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: Celebrated a friend's birthday last night here! We had a great time! We got bottle service for a fraction of the price of other places on Saturday night and it was packed! Colton and Brandon were great hosts especially during our last minute reservations. Skye was an amazing waitress, and Vicente (security) and Drago were also awesome. The DJ was DJ CEO and Top 40/Hiphop played all night. We're Vegas vets by now and have been to many of the major clubs on the Strip-we'll for sure return here when we are back!

Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: Came here for girls night out and had the best time! Brandon helped us out getting bottle service and he could not have been more helpful. Service, music, and drink were all excellent; we can't wait to come back!
